page.title: 05Crown Inn Hotel,Whitebrook 1
page.content: The privately owned Crown Inn Hotel is situated in the Whitebrook Valley in an area of outstanding natural beauty. It is a small but internationally famous establishment. Many celebrated people stay at the Hotel, including pop and film stars. Visitors come from America, Europe, and the Middle and Far East. The Hotel prides itself on its "haute cuisine" and offers a wide variety of continental and English food. Examples of food served might include; mousse de concombre et fromage (cucumber & cheese mousse), tartlette Alsacienne (pastry tart filled with cheese, onions, & bacon), & grenadin de veau en brioch, (loin of veal with brandy cooked in a thin pancake with onions,mushrooms, and a cream sauce).
